SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT DISTINCT st.str_idx AS str_idx, CASE WHEN (ac.ct_parent = 11 or st.str_category = 11) THEN 'food' WHEN (ac.ct_parent = 10 or st.str_category = 10) THEN 'tour' WHEN (ac.ct_parent = 7 or st.str_category = 7) THEN 'exp' WHEN ac.ct_parent = 3 or st.str_category = 3 THEN 'fest' WHEN ac.ct_parent = 5 or st.str_category = 5 THEN 'hotel' ELSE 'etc' END AS store_type, IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(al.like_status) FROM ad_like al WHERE al.str_idx = st.str_idx AND al.like_type = 'S' AND al.like_status = 'Y'), 0) AS str_like_cnt, st.str_lat, st.str_lng, st.str_category, TRUNCATE(IFNULL((SELECT AVG(review_avg) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx), 0.0), 1)AS review_ave, ac.ct_ko_nm, ac.ct_ja_nm, ac.ct_zh_nm, ac.ct_es_nm, ac.ct_eu_nm, ac.ct_de_nm, asd.str_dt_type AS str_dt_type, CAST(ac.ct_parent AS SIGNED) AS ct_parent, asd.str_dt_name AS str_dt_name, IFNULL(CONCAT(#{url}, st.str_image), st.str_image) AS str_image, IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc, '') AS str_dt_desc, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx) AS str_review_cnt, 0.0 AS str_review_ave, TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)))),1) AS str_km , IFNULL((SELECT like_status FROM ad_like WHERE mb_idx = IFNULL(#{mb_idx}, '') and str_idx = st.str_idx), 'N') AS like_status FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ac ON st.str_category = ac.ct_idx WHERE asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} AND asd.str_dt_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type, asd.str_dt_name ORDER BY IFNULL(#{sorting},''), asd.str_dt_desc DESC

SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT DISTINCT st.str_idx AS str_idx , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(al.like_status) FROM ad_like al WHERE al.str_idx = st.str_idx AND al.like_type = 'S' AND al.like_status = 'Y'), 0) AS str_like_cnt , st.str_lat , st.str_lng , st.str_category , IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(AVG(review_avg), 1) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx), 0.0)AS review_ave , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_de_nm , asd.str_dt_type AS str_dt_type , asd.str_dt_name AS str_dt_name , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_address, '') AS str_dt_address , IFNULL(st.operating_hour, '') AS operating_hour , IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image), st.str_image) AS str_image , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc , '') AS str_dt_desc , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx ) AS str_review_cnt , 0.0 AS str_review_ave , TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)))),1) AS str_km , IFNULL( (SELECT like_status FROM ad_like WHERE mb_idx = IFNULL(#{mb_idx}, '') and str_idx = st.str_idx), 'N') AS like_status FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ac ON st.str_category = ac.ct_idx WHERE (ac.ct_parent = #{ct_parent} OR st.str_category = #{ct_parent}) AND asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type, asd.str_dt_name ORDER BY IFNULL(CONCAT(#{sorting}),'')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT st.str_idx AS str_idx , IFNULL(st.str_image, '') AS str_image , asd.str_dt_name AS str_dt_name , '' AS banner_url , 'FASTIVAL' AS banner_type FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ac ON st.str_category = ac.ct_idx WHERE asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} AND (st.str_category = 3 OR st.str_category = 3) GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type UNION ALL SELECT ab.bn_idx AS str_idx , ab.bn_img AS str_image , ab.bn_title AS str_dt_name , ab.bn_url AS banner_url , 'BANNER' AS banner_type FROM ad_banner ab ) AS banner_list ORDER BY RAND()

SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT DISTINCT st.str_idx , IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(al.like_status) FROM ad_like al WHERE al.str_idx = st.str_idx AND al.like_type = 'S' AND al.like_status = 'Y'), 0) AS str_like_cnt , st.str_lat , st.str_lng , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_de_nm , IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image), st.str_image) AS str_image , st.str_phone , st.str_category , IFNULL(st.str_website, '') AS str_website , asd.str_dt_name , asd.str_dt_type , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_address , '') AS str_dt_address , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_address_dt , '') AS str_dt_address_dt , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc , '') AS str_dt_desc , TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)))),1) AS str_km , IFNULL(st.operating_hour , '가게 문의') AS operating_hour , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx ) AS str_review_cnt , IFNULL((SELECT TRUNCATE(AVG(review_avg), 1) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = st.str_idx), 0.0)AS review_ave , IFNULL( (SELECT like_status FROM ad_like WHERE mb_idx = IFNULL(#{mb_idx}, '') and str_idx = st.str_idx GROUP BY mb_idx), 'N') AS like_status FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ac ON st.str_category = ac.ct_idx WHERE st.str_idx = #{str_idx} AND asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type ORDER BY IFNULL(#{sorting},'')
SELECT ac.ct_idx , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_de_nm FROM ad_category ac WHERE ac.ct_parent = 1
SELECT ac.ct_idx , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_de_nm FROM ad_category ac WHERE ac.ct_parent = #{ct_parent}

SELECT av.str_idx, am.mb_nickname, av.mb_idx, av.rv_idx, TRUNCATE(AVG(av.review_avg), 1) AS review_ave, COALESCE((SELECT 'Y' FROM dual WHERE av.mb_idx = #{mb_idx}), 'N') AS my_review, COUNT(ar.str_idx) AS review_cnt, COALESCE(al.like_status, 'N') AS like_status, av.rv_type, av.rv_anonym, av.rv_blind, av.rv_contents, DATE_FORMAT(av.rv_reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') AS rv_reg_date, av.rv_reg_time, COALESCE(av.rv_reply, '') AS rv_reply FROM ad_review av LEFT JOIN ad_review ar ON av.str_idx = ar.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_like al ON av.mb_idx = al.mb_idx AND av.str_idx = al.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_member am ON av.mb_idx = am.mb_idx WHERE av.str_idx = #{str_idx} AND av.rv_use = 'Y' GROUP BY av.rv_idx ORDER BY av.rv_reg_date
SELECT avi.rv_img_idx , CONCAT(#{url},avi.rv_img_file) as rv_img_file from ad_review_image avi WHERE avi.rv_idx = #{rv_idx} AND avi.rv_img_use = 'Y'
SELECT keyword FROM ad_search_history WHERE (search_lang = #{lang}) GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT asd.str_idx , mn.mn_idx , asd.str_dt_type , IFNULL(mn_contents, '') AS mn_contents , mn.mn_nm , IF(mn.mn_price = 0, '가게 문의', CONCAT(FORMAT(CAST(mn.mn_price AS SIGNED), 0), '원')) AS mn_price , IFNULL(CONCAT(#{url}, NULLIF(mn.mn_image, '')), '') AS mn_image from ad_menu mn left join ad_store_detail asd on mn.str_idx = asd.str_idx WHERE (asd.str_dt_type = 'ko' OR asd.str_dt_type = #{lang}) and mn.str_idx = #{str_idx} GROUP by mn.mn_idx
SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT(#{url},mim.mn_img_file), '') as mn_img_file from ad_menu_image mim left join ad_menu amn on mim.mn_idx = amn.mn_idx where mim.mn_idx = #{mn_idx};

SELECT DISTINCT st.str_idx AS str_idx , st.str_category , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_de_nm , asd.str_dt_type AS str_dt_type , asd.str_dt_name AS str_dt_name , IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image), st.str_image) AS str_image , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc , '') AS str_dt_desc , IFNULL(asd.str_time, '') AS str_time FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ac ON st.str_category = ac.ct_idx WHERE asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} AND (st.str_category = 3 OR st.str_category = #{str_category}) GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type ORDER BY RAND(), asd.str_dt_desc DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT mn.mn_idx , mn.str_idx , IFNULL(mn_contents, '') AS mn_contents , mn.mn_nm , IF(mn.mn_price = 0, '가게 문의', CONCAT(FORMAT(CAST(mn.mn_price AS SIGNED), 0), '원')) AS mn_price , IFNULL(mn.mn_member, '') AS mn_member , CONCAT('인원 :' , IFNULL(mn.mn_member, ''),'명') AS mn_member_text , IFNULL(mn.mn_check_in, '') AS mn_check_in , CONCAT('체크인 : ',IFNULL(mn.mn_check_in, '')) AS mn_check_in_text , IFNULL(mn.mn_check_out, '') AS mn_check_out , CONCAT('체크아웃 : ',IFNULL(mn.mn_check_out, '')) AS mn_check_out_text , IFNULL(CONCAT(#{url}, NULLIF(mn.mn_image, '')), '') AS mn_image , IFNULL(mn_refund, '가게 문의') AS mn_refund , IFNULL(mn_sub_title, '') AS mn_sub_title from ad_menu mn WHERE mn_idx = #{mn_idx}
